trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Canton
There were no other sightings in Canton on or around August 26th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking with my neighbor when I first observed the pulsating object. I asked him if he could distinguish colors he did blue green white red and green. we ran up the road a little ways to see if we could get closer . we watched the UFO hover for about 15-20 mins and witnessed multiple airplanes fly by one airplane was headed towards the object and suddenly changed course. we watched the UFO vanish before our eyes. we never took our eyes off the craft.
Summary: I was outside smoking with my neighbor when I first observed the pulsating object. I asked him if he could destinguish colors he did blue green white red and green. we ran up the road a little ways to see if we could get closer .
